equation:
\begin{equation}
\delta A^{-1}=-A^{-1}\left(  \delta A\right)  A^{-1}\;,
\label{DerivationOfInverse}%
\

\begin{equation}
\left\{  A_{1},\cdots,A_{2n}\right\}  _{{\footnotesize NB}}=\frac{1}{\left(
N-n\right)  !}\sum_{i_{1},\cdots,i_{N-n}=1}^{N}\frac{\partial\left(
A_{1},\cdots,A_{2n},x_{i_{1}},p_{i_{1}},\cdots,x_{i_{N-n}},p_{i_{N-n}}\right)
}{\partial\left(  x_{1},p_{1},\cdots,x_{N},p_{N}\right)  }\;.
\label{SymplecticTrace}%
\

\begin{equation}
A_{j-1\;j}^{-1}=-A_{j\;j-1}^{-1}=-\left\{  C_{1},\cdots,C_{j-2},C_{j+1}%
,\cdots,C_{2n-2}\right\}  _{{\footnotesize NB}}/\sqrt{\det A}\;,
\

\begin{equation}
\left\{  f,g\right\}  _{{\footnotesize DB}}=\frac{1}{\left\{  C_{1}%
,C_{2},\cdots\right\}  _{{\footnotesize NB}}}\left\{  f,g,C_{1},C_{2}%
,\cdots\right\}  _{{\footnotesize NB}}\;. \label{DBasNB}%
\

\begin{equation}
0=\left[  A,\left[  B,C\right]  \right]  +\left[  B,\left[  C,A\right]
\right]  +\left[  C,\left[  A,B\right]  \right]  \;.
\

\begin{equation}
2\times\left[  A,B,C,D\right]  =\left[  A,\left[  B,C,D\right]  \right]
-\left[  B,\left[  C,D,A\right]  \right]  +\left[  C,\left[  D,A,B\right]
\right]  -\left[  D,\left[  A,B,C\right]  \right]  \;,
\

\begin{equation}
0=\left\{  A,\left[  B,C,D\right]  \right\}  -\left\{  B,\left[  C,D,A\right]
\right\}  +\left\{  C,\left[  D,A,B\right]  \right\}  -\left\{  D,\left[
A,B,C\right]  \right\}  \;.
\

\begin{equation}
\lim_{\hbar\rightarrow0}\left(  \frac{1}{i\hbar}\right)  \left[  A,B\right]
=\left\{  A,B\right\}  _{{\footnotesize PB}}\;,
\

\begin{equation}
\left(  A,\mathcal{A}\,|\,B_{1},B_{2}\right)  =\left[  A,B_{2}\right]  \left[
B_{1},\mathcal{A}\right]  -\left[  A,B_{1}\right]  \left[  B_{2}%
,\mathcal{A}\right]  -A\left[  B_{1},B_{2}\right]  \mathcal{A}\;.
\

\begin{equation}
\sum_{\left(  n+k\right)  !\;\text{perms}\;\sigma}\operatorname{sgn}\left(
\sigma\right)  \left[  \left[  A_{\sigma_{1}},\cdots,A_{\sigma_{n}}\right]
,A_{\sigma_{n+1}},\cdots,A_{\sigma_{n+k}}\right]  =0\;.
\

\begin{equation}
\left[  \left[  A_{1},A_{2}\right]  ,\mathbf{B}\right]  -\left[  \left[
A_{1},\mathbf{B}\right]  ,A_{2}\right]  -\left[  A_{1},\left[  A_{2}%
,\mathbf{B}\right]  \right]  =\left(  A_{1},A_{2}\,|\,\mathbf{B}\right)
-\left(  A_{2},A_{1}\,|\,\mathbf{B}\right)  \;.
\

\begin{equation}
\left[  f,g\right]  =\sum_{j,k}\mathbb{P}_{j}\left(  \left[  f,g\right]
\right)  _{jk}\mathbb{P}_{k}\;,\;\;\;\mathbb{P}_{k}^{2}=\mathbb{P}%
_{k}\;,\;\;\;\mathbb{P}_{j}\mathbb{P}_{k}=0\;,\;\;\;j\neq k\;.
\

\begin{equation}
\sigma\times\left(  \left[  f,g\right]  \right)  _{\sigma}=\left\{  \left(
\left[  f,g\right]  \right)  _{\sigma},\left[  C_{1},C_{2}\right]
,\cdots\right\}  \pm\ \ \text{permutations,}%
\
